text: This is a list of episodes from the American sitcom Sam & Cat, shown on Nickelodeon. It is a crossover / spin-off of the shows Victorious and iCarly. Sam Puckett and Cat Valentine meet in Los Angeles. Sam moves in with Cat and they become best friends as well as babysitters.
